member.name: M:Klondike.AppBuilderExtensions.UseFallbackFile(Owin.IAppBuilder,System.String,Microsoft.Owin.PathString[])
member.summary: Sends a static content file for any request that would otherwise result in a 404.
member.param: Optional list of path strings that should suppress this behavior.

member.name: M:Klondike.MetaController.GetComponentVersions
member.summary: Gets version information for components of Klondike.

member.name: M:Klondike.IVirtualPathUtility.MapPath(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a virtual path to a physical file system path.

member.name: M:Klondike.IVirtualPathUtility.ToAbsolute(System.String)
member.summary: Converts an app-relative path (e.g. ~/index.html to an absolute URI path (e.g. /myApp/index.html).
